sentences.english: The health professional usually faces inner turbulence when caring for the suffering of others.
sentences.chinese: 面對病苦死亡，醫護人員必然產生內在情緒的擾動。

sentences.english: To banish them, we must first purify our bodies and minds.
sentences.chinese: 要消除病苦，必先淨化自己的身心。

sentences.english: Seeing the suffering of the elderly made the youngsters appreciate their own blessings.
sentences.chinese: 看到了病苦的長輩，小朋友學會要珍惜自己的幸福。
